title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the NeuroAdvertisingAnalyzer project, considering ethical and privacy concerns related to neuromarketing and consumer data.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data acquisition, processing, analysis, and visualization.

title: Develop Brain-Computer Interface
description: Implement the brain-computer interface (BCI) component for acquiring and preprocessing neurological data from consumers.

title: Implement Data Processing Pipeline
description: Develop the data processing pipeline for cleaning, transforming, and preparing the neurological data for analysis.

title: Develop Analysis and Visualization Components
description: Implement the analysis algorithms and visualization tools for interpreting and presenting the consumer response data.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to security and privacy regulations for handling sensitive consumer data.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive system testing, including functional, integration, performance, and security testing.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Prepare technical documentation, including user guides, API references, and system architecture diagrams.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the NeuroAdvertisingAnalyzer system to production environments and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms.
